text: Ione is an unincorporated community in Weld County, Colorado. ==History== A post office called Ione was established in 1927, and remained in operation until 1958. Tradition states the name "Ione" is a phonetic spelling of "I own (it)", a favorite saying of the original owner of the town site. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Weld County, Colorado Category:Unincorporated communities in Colorado
title: Ione, Colorado
